title: ChatPrivacyMode

name: ChatPrivacyMode
type: enum
summary: ''
description: |
  Internally controls the user's chat privacy settings.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: AllUsers
    summary: |
      A player can chat with all users in a game.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: NoOne
    summary: |
      A player cannot chat with any other users in a game.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Friends
    summary: |
      A player can only chat with users in a game that are on their connections
      list.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
